news.title: Annual Fundraiser Dinner - Support OIA Academy Edmonton
news.arabic_title: عشاء الجمع الخيري السنوي - ادعم أكاديمية أويا إدمونتون
news.excerpt: Join us for our annual fundraiser dinner to support Islamic education at OIA Academy Edmonton. Enjoy delicious halal cuisine, inspiring speeches, and help us reach our goal of enhancing educational opportunities for our students.
news.content:
Assalamu Alaikum Dear Community Members,

We are delighted to invite you to our Annual Fundraiser Dinner, a special evening dedicated to supporting Islamic education at OIA Academy Edmonton.

🌟 **Event Highlights:**
- Authentic halal cuisine prepared by renowned local chefs
- Inspiring keynote address by respected Islamic scholar
- Student performances showcasing their talents
- Silent auction featuring unique items and experiences
- Recognition of community supporters and volunteers

📅 **Event Details:**
- **Date:** Saturday, February 24th, 2024
- **Time:** 6:00 PM - 10:00 PM
- **Venue:** Edmonton Convention Centre - Hall C
- **Dress Code:** Business/Islamic formal attire

💝 **Your Impact:**
Your participation directly supports:
- Enhanced classroom resources and technology
- Professional development for our dedicated teachers
- Scholarship opportunities for deserving students
- Facility improvements and learning spaces
- Extracurricular programs and activities

🎫 **Ticket Information:**
- Individual Tickets: $75
- Family Package (2 adults + children): $150
- Sponsor Table (8 guests): $600

**[Purchase Tickets on Keela →](https://keela.co/oia-academy-fundraiser-dinner)**

Early bird discount: 10% off until February 10th

🤝 **Sponsorship Opportunities:**
We offer various sponsorship levels for businesses and individuals who wish to make a larger impact:
- Platinum Sponsor: $5,000
- Gold Sponsor: $2,500
- Silver Sponsor: $1,000
- Bronze Sponsor: $500

All sponsors will receive recognition during the event and in our promotional materials.

📞 **Contact Information:**
For questions or sponsorship inquiries, please contact:
- Email: events@oiaacademy.ca
- Phone: (780) 123-4567

Let us come together as a community to invest in the Islamic education of our future leaders. Your support makes a meaningful difference in the lives of our students.

Barakallahu feekum for your continued support.

With warm regards,
OIA Academy Edmonton Administration

news.title: Welcome to OIA Academy Edmonton - A New Chapter Begins
news.arabic_title: أهلاً بكم في أكاديمية الفاروق الإسلامية - إدمونتون
news.excerpt: We are thrilled to announce the opening of OIA Academy Edmonton, bringing quality Islamic education to our community.
news.content:
Assalamu Alaikum dear families and community members,

We are incredibly excited to announce the official opening of OIA Academy Edmonton! After months of planning and preparation, we are ready to welcome students into a nurturing Islamic educational environment.

Our academy is committed to providing:
- High-quality academic education following Alberta curriculum
- Strong Islamic foundation and character development
- Experienced and dedicated faculty members
- Modern facilities and learning resources
- Small class sizes for personalized attention

We look forward to partnering with families in raising the next generation of confident, knowledgeable, and righteous Muslim leaders.

Barakallahu feekum,
OIA Academy Administration
news.author: OIA Administration

news.title: Ramadan Preparation Activities
news.excerpt: Special activities and programs to help our students prepare for the blessed month of Ramadan.
news.content:
As we approach the blessed month of Ramadan, OIA Academy is organizing special preparation activities for our students:

📚 Ramadan Learning Sessions
- Understanding the significance of Ramadan
- Learning proper fasting etiquette
- Memorizing Ramadan duas and supplications

🤲 Community Service Projects
- Food drive for local families
- Making iftar boxes for community members
- Charity collection for those in need

🕌 Spiritual Activities
- Daily reflection circles
- Quran recitation practice
- Islamic history storytelling sessions

These activities will help our students develop a deeper connection with their faith and understand the true spirit of Ramadan.

May Allah accept our efforts and grant us a blessed Ramadan.
news.author: Islamic Studies Department

news.title: Student Achievement: Quran Memorization Milestone
news.arabic_title: إنجاز الطلاب: إتمام حفظ جزء عم
news.excerpt: Congratulations to our Grade 3 student Aisha for completing the memorization of Juz Amma!
news.content:
Masha'Allah! We are proud to celebrate a wonderful achievement by one of our Grade 3 students.

Aisha has successfully completed the memorization of Juz Amma (the 30th part of the Holy Quran), demonstrating incredible dedication and perseverance over the past year.

This achievement represents:
✨ Hours of daily practice and review
✨ Strong support from family at home
✨ Guidance from our Quran teachers
✨ Personal commitment to Islamic learning

Aisha will be recognized in our upcoming school assembly, and we encourage all students to follow her inspiring example.

May Allah reward Aisha and her family, and may this be a stepping stone toward further Islamic knowledge and spiritual growth.
news.author: Quran Department

news.title: Parent-Teacher Conference Schedule
news.excerpt: Important information about upcoming parent-teacher conferences for all grade levels.
news.content:
Dear Parents and Guardians,

We are pleased to invite you to our upcoming Parent-Teacher Conferences scheduled for the week of March 18-22, 2024.

Conference Schedule:
📅 Monday-Wednesday: Kindergarten through Grade 3
📅 Thursday-Friday: Grades 4-6

Time Slots Available:
⏰ 3:30 PM - 6:00 PM (after school hours)
⏰ 7:00 PM - 8:30 PM (evening sessions)

What to Expect:
- Academic progress review
- Islamic studies development
- Character and behavioral assessment
- Goal setting for remainder of year

To schedule your appointment, please contact the main office at (780) 123-4567 or email admin@oiaacademy.ca by March 15th.

We look forward to meeting with you to discuss your child's progress and how we can work together to support their continued growth.

Jazakum Allahu khayran,
OIA Academy Faculty
